features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a grand, circular pendant featuring Lord Ganesha, the remover of obstacles. The Ganesha is intricately detailed with Polki diamonds, offering a radiant sparkle. The setting is designed in an open Polki style to maximize brilliance. The piece is adorned with a Pear cut emerald, and delicate coral and emerald drops that add a touch of vibrancy. The necklace strings consists of strands of Polki diamonds followed by strands of coral beads for a truly unique look.

description: This Ganesha Polki Haaram is more than just jewelry; it is a symbol of prosperity, wisdom, and good fortune. The uncut Polki diamonds, meticulously hand-set by skilled artisans, showcase exceptional craftsmanship and ensure lasting brilliance. The Hyderabadi Polish adds a touch of timeless elegance and gives it a rich, antique feel. As a significant deity in the Hindu religion, and crafted with authentic polki diamonds and coral, this piece is a truly heirloom quality piece, a treasured artifact for generations to come.
